dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3340518L] Counterfeit Goods on www.BurberryScarfOnline.com

-----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1servers.net [mailto:abuse@ev1servers.net] Sent: Monday, March 05, 2007 10:41 PM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3340518L] Counterfeit Goods on www.BurberryScarfOnline.com ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Counterfeit Goods on www.BurberryScarfOnline.com Added by system at Monday, Mar 5 2007 03:51 pm X-MailFrom: fsilva@burberryusa.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Mon Mar 5 15:51:07 2007 Received: (qmail 13171 invoked by alias); 5 Mar 2007 21:51:07 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 13168 invoked from network); 5 Mar 2007 21:51:06 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 5 Mar 2007 21:51:06 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Mon, 5 Mar 2007 15:51:06 -0600 Return-path: Delivery-date: Mon, 05 Mar 2007 15:51:06 -0600 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from fsilva@burberryusa.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HOL5F-0005Fw-V6 for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 05 Mar 2007 15:51:06 -0600 Received: from newyorkx.corporate.burberryusa.com ([38.117.230.194]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from fsilva@burberryusa.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HOL55-000I1s-5T for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 05 Mar 2007 15:50:55 -0600 Received: from newyorkx.corporate.burberryusa.com ([127.0.0.1]) by newyorkx.corporate.burberryusa.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Mon, 5 Mar 2007 16:50:49 -0500 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.3790.2757 Content-class: urn:content-classes:message Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C75F70.56919CA0" Subject: Counterfeit Goods on www.BurberryScarfOnline.com Importance: normal Priority: normal Date: Mon, 5 Mar 2007 16:50:49 -0500 Message-ID: <9B23754DD4C01445AE3E4F2394B41B3004713CC5@NEWYORKX.corporate.burberryusa .com> X-MS-Has-Attach: X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: Thread-Topic: Counterfeit Goods on www.BurberryScarfOnline.com Thread-Index: AcdfcFbaTSxzLam1T6mXsxi+5A6Hgg== From: "Fabio Silva" To: X-OriginalArrivalTime: 05 Mar 2007 21:50:49.0858 (UTC) FILETIME=[56AE2E20:01C75F70] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) March 5, 2007 VIA ELECTRONIC MAIL ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. 1333 North Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110 Dallas, TX 75207 Email: abuse@theplanet.com Fax: (214) 782-7801 RE: Counterfeit Goods on www.BurberryScarfOnline.com Burberry Reference No. US2234 Dear Sir/Madam: I CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of Burberry Limited ("IP Owner"), the owner of certain intellectual property rights, specifically federal trademark registrations 2,022,789 and 1,133,122 for the BURBERRY CHECK trademark and registrations 260,843; 510,077 and 1,133,122 and the BURBERRY word. I have a good faith belief that the materials found through the links below are not authorized by the IP Owner, its agent, or the law and therefore infringe the IP Owner's rights according to state, federal, or United States law. The following are links to the infringing uses: http://burberryscarfonline.com/ http://www.burberryscarfonline.com/burberry-cashmere-scarf/blue-burberry -scarf/ http://www.burberryscarfonline.com/burberry-cashmere-scarf/blue-burberry -scarf/ http://www.burberryscarfonline.com/burberry-cashmere-scarf/novacheck-bur berry-scarf/ http://www.burberryscarfonline.com/burberry-cashmere-scarf/lightgrey-bur berry-scarf/ http://www.burberryscarfonline.com/burberry-cashmere-scarf/pink-burberry -scarf/ http://www.burberryscarfonline.com/burberry-cashmere-scarf/grey-burberry -scarf/ http://www.burberryscarfonline.com/burberry-cashmere-scarf/camel-burberr y-scarf/ http://www.burberryscarfonline.com/burberry-cashmere-scarf/darkblue-burb erry-scarf/ http://www.burberryscarfonline.com/burberry-cashmere-scarf/red-burberry- scarf/ http://www.burberryscarfonline.com/burberry-cashmere-scarf/black-burberr y-scarf/ http://www.burberryscarfonline.com/burberry-ties/burberry-london-tie-lig ht-camel-big-check-bu305/ I am requesting that ThePlanet, pursuant to its Acceptable Use Policy ("AUP"), shut down the Site for offering for sale counterfeit goods. In particular, I refer to those parts of the AUP that read: "Customers may not transmit, distribute, download, copy, cache, host, or otherwise store on a Server any information, data, material, or work that infringes the intellectual property rights of others. The Planet has the right to disable access to, or remove, infringing content to the extent required under any law or regulation, including the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998." "The Planet reserves the right to suspend permanently or terminate the Services of any Customer that repeatedly violates The Planet's Intellectual Property Infringement Policy or any copyright law." Therefore, based on burberryscarfonline.com's flagrant violation of the AUP, Burberry kindly requests that ThePlanet provide the remedial action of terminating its contractual relationship with the Site or otherwise bring it into compliance. Sincerely, /s/ Fabio R. Silva Intellectual Property Counsel BURBERRY LIMITED, USA 1350 Ave of the Americas New York, NY 10019 212-707-6500 main 212-707-6545 direct dial 212-246-2486 fax This message, including any attachment(s) is confidential information and is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s). Unauthorized interception, review, use, disclosure or distribution of any information contained within this message and/or its attachment(s), is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, please notify the sender by replying to this mail message and delete all copies of the original message and any attachments. MIME element (text/html)

March 5, 2007

 

VIA ELECTRONIC MAIL

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

1333 North Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110

Dallas, TX 75207

Email:  abuse@theplanet.com

Fax: (214) 782-7801

 

          &nbs p; RE:  Counterfeit Goods on www.BurberryScarfOnline.com

Burberry Reference No. US2234                                              

 

Dear Sir/Madam:

 

I CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of Burberry Limited (“IP Owner”), the owner of certain intellectual property rights, specifically federal trademark registrations 2,022,789 and 1,133,122 for the BURBERRY CHECK trademark and registrations 260,843; 510,077 and 1,133,122 and the BURBERRY word. 

 

I have a good faith belief that the materials found through the links below are not authorized by the IP Owner, its agent, or the law and therefore infringe the IP Owner's rights according to state, federal, or United States law.

 

The following are links to the infringing uses:

 

http://burberryscarfonline.com/

http://www.burberryscarfonline.com/burberry-cashmere-scar f/blue-burberry-scarf/

http://www.burberryscarfonline.com/burberry-cashmere-scar f/blue-burberry-scarf/

http://www.burberryscarfonline.com/burberry-cashmere -scarf/novacheck-burberry-scarf/

http://www.burberryscarfonline.com/burberry-cashmere -scarf/lightgrey-burberry-scarf/

http://www.burberryscarfonline.com/burberry-cashmere-scar f/pink-burberry-scarf/

http://www.burberryscarfonline.com/burberry-cashmere-scar f/grey-burberry-scarf/

http://www.burberryscarfonline.com/burberry-cashmere-sca rf/camel-burberry-scarf/

http://www.burberryscarfonline.com/burberry-cashmere- scarf/darkblue-burberry-scarf/

http://www.burberryscarfonline.com/burberry-cashmere-scarf /red-burberry-scarf/

http://www.burberryscarfonline.com/burberry-cashmere-sca rf/black-burberry-scarf/

http://www.burberryscarfonline.com/burb erry-ties/burberry-london-tie-light-camel-big-check-bu305/

 

I am requesting that ThePlanet, pursuant to its Acceptable Use Policy (“AUP”), shut down the Site for offering for sale counterfeit goods.  In particular, I refer to those parts of the AUP that read:

 

“Customers may not transmit, distribute, download, copy, cache, host, or otherwise store on a Server any information, data, material, or work that infringes the intellectual property rights of others. The Planet has the right to disable access to, or remove, infringing content to the extent required under any law or regulation, including the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998.”

“The Planet reserves the right to suspend permanently or terminate the Services of any Customer that repeatedly violates The Planet's Intellectual Property Infringement Policy or any copyright law.”

Therefore, based on burberryscarfonline.com’s flagrant violation of the AUP, Burberry kindly requests that ThePlanet provide the remedial action of terminating its contractual relationship with the Site or otherwise bring it into compliance. 

 

Sincerely,

 

/s/

 

Fabio R. Silva

Intellec tual Property Counsel

BURBERRY LIMITED, USA
1350 Ave of the Americas
New York, NY  10019
212-707-6500 main
212-707-6545 direct dial
212-246-2486 fax
